schema.description: Statistics of LSP ping and trace tests.
Statistics of SRV6 ping and trace tests.
Statistics of EVPN ping and trace tests.
Statistics of BIER ping and trace tests.
Statistics of VPLS ping and trace tests.
Statistics of PWE3 ping and trace tests.

loss-ratio.description: Packet loss ratio of a test.

rtt-min.description: Minimum RTT of all test packets.

rtt-max.description: Maximum RTT of all test packets.

average-rtt.description: Average RTT of all test packets.

details.description: List of ping results of all packets in a test.

index.description: Serial number of a test packet received.

ip-addr.description: Reply address in a received response packet.

packet-size.description: Number of bytes in a received response packet.

result-type.description: Result of packet sending, which is either success or timeout.

is-delete.description: Enable/disable the function of deleting test results.

details.description: List of ping results of all packets in a test.

detail.description: Statistics of ping result of a single packet in a test.

hop-index.description: Serial number of a hop in the test path. For a ping-type test such as the ping test or LSP ping test, there is only one hop in the test path, so the value is 1. For a trace-type test such as the trace test or LSP trace test, the value indicates the exact serial number of a hop in the test path.

ds-ip-addr.description: Destination address of the related hop in a test.

is-delete.description: Enable/disable the function of deleting test results.

ping-result.description: Statistics of test result of a certain hop in the test path. For a ping-type test, there is only one test result.

loss-ratio.description: Packet loss ratio of a test.

rtt-min.description: Minimum RTT of all test packets.

rtt-max.description: Maximum RTT of all test packets.

average-rtt.description: Average RTT of all test packets.

ping-result-details.description: List of ping results of all packets in a test.

index.description: Serial number of a test packet received by a certain hop.

dest-ip-addr.description: Destination address of the related hop in a test.

packet-size.description: Number of bytes in a received response packet.

ttl.description: Hop limit of received response packets.

result-type.description: Result of packet sending, which is either success or timeout.

is-delete.description: Enable/disable the function of deleting test results.

incoming-if-name.description: The logical source interface of echo response packet.

incoming-phy-if-name.description: The physical source interface of echo response packet.

trace-result-details.description: List of ping results of all packets in a test.

trace-result-detail.description: Statistics of ping result of a single packet in a test.

index.description: Serial number of a hop in the test path. For a ping-type test such as the ping test or LSP ping test, there is only one hop in the test path, so the value is 1. For a trace-type test such as the trace test or LSP trace test, the value indicates the exact serial number of a hop in the test path.

dest-ip-addr.description: Destination address of the related hop in a test.

is-delete.description: Enable/disable the function of deleting test results.

hop-index.description: The index of the hop.

is-delete.description: Enable/disable the function of deleting test results.

probe-index.description: The index of the probe packet.

rtt.description: RTT of test packets, expressed in milliseconds.

replier.description: Reply address of the related hop in a test.

result-type.description: Result of packet sending, which is either success or timeout.

label-stack-bottom.description: Show MPLS label stack bottom flag.

tunnel-name.description: Name of the TE tunnel created by RSVP signaling. This option is available when LSP Type is set to TE Tunnel.
